mdRecord.dcterms:title: Monumental Church
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Johnston, Frances Benjamin, 1864-1952
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Exterior, portico of monumental church. Monumental Church was built from 1812-1814 by Robert Mills. It stands at 1224 East Broad Street, Richmond, VA. Virginia Landmarks Register (1999). Richmond, Virginia.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Carnegie Survey of the Architecture of the South
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Historic buildings--Virginia
Johnston, Frances Benjamin, 1864-1952
Mills, Robert, 1781-1855
